29 #include "ros/ros.h"
30 
31 #include <nav_msgs/GetMap.h>
32 #include <nav_msgs/Odometry.h>
33 #include <geometry_msgs/Quaternion.h>
34 #include <geometry_msgs/PoseStamped.h>
35 #include <sensor_msgs/image_encodings.h>
36 
37 #include <cv_bridge/cv_bridge.h>
38 #include <image_transport/image_transport.h>
39 #include <Eigen/Geometry>
40 
41 #include <a3_help/HectorMapTools.h>

43 using namespace std;
44 
49 class MapAsImageProvider
50 {
51 public:
52  MapAsImageProvider()
53  : pn_("~")
54  {
55 
56  image_transport_ = new image_transport::ImageTransport(n_);
57  image_transport_publisher_full_ = image_transport_->advertise("map_image/full", 1);
58  image_transport_publisher_tile_ = image_transport_->advertise("map_image/tile", 1);
59 
60  pose_sub_ = n_.subscribe("pose", 1, &MapAsImageProvider::poseCallback, this);
61  map_sub_ = n_.subscribe("map", 1, &MapAsImageProvider::mapCallback, this);
62 
63  //Which frame_id makes sense?
64  cv_img_full_.header.frame_id = "map_image";
65  cv_img_full_.encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO8;
66 
67  cv_img_tile_.header.frame_id = "map_image";
68  cv_img_tile_.encoding = sensor_msgs::image_encodings::MONO8;
69 
70  //Fixed cell width for tile based image, use dynamic_reconfigure for this later
71  p_size_tiled_map_image_x_ = 64;
72  p_size_tiled_map_image_y_ = 64;
73 
74  ROS_INFO("Map to Image node started.");
75  }
76 
77  ~MapAsImageProvider()
78  {
79  delete image_transport_;
80  }
81 
82  //We assume the robot position is available as a PoseStamped here (querying tf would be the more general option)
83  //void poseCallback(const geometry_msgs::PoseStampedConstPtr& pose)
84  void poseCallback(const nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr& odo)
85  {
86  pose_ptr_ = odo;
87  }
88 
89  //The map->image conversion runs every time a new map is received at the moment
90  void mapCallback(const nav_msgs::OccupancyGridConstPtr& map)
91  {
92  int size_x = map->info.width;
93  int size_y = map->info.height;
94 
95 // bad in original:
96 // std::cout << "Origin [x,y]=[" << map->info.origin.position.x << "," \
97 // << map->info.origin.position.x << std::endl;
98 // sm
99  std::cout << "Origin [x,y]=[" << map->info.origin.position.x << "," << map->info.origin.position.y << std::endl;
100 
101  if ((size_x < 3) || (size_y < 3) ){
102  ROS_INFO("Map size is only x: %d, y: %d . Not running map to image conversion", size_x, size_y);
103  return;
104  }
105 
106  // Only if someone is subscribed to it, do work and publish full map image
107  if (image_transport_publisher_full_.getNumSubscribers() > 0){
108  cv::Mat* map_mat = &cv_img_full_.image;
109 
110  // resize cv image if it doesn't have the same dimensions as the map
111  if ( (map_mat->rows != size_y) && (map_mat->cols != size_x)){
112  *map_mat = cv::Mat(size_y, size_x, CV_8U);
113  }
114 
115  const std::vector<int8_t>& map_data (map->data);
116 
117  unsigned char *map_mat_data_p=(unsigned char*) map_mat->data;
118 
119  //We have to flip around the y axis, y for image starts at the top and y for map at the bottom
120  int size_y_rev = size_y-1;
121 
122  for (int y = size_y_rev; y >= 0; --y){
123 
124  int idx_map_y = size_x * (size_y -y);
125  int idx_img_y = size_x * y;
126 
127  for (int x = 0; x < size_x; ++x){
128 
129  int idx = idx_img_y + x;
130 
131  switch (map_data[idx_map_y + x])
132  {
133  case -1:
134  map_mat_data_p[idx] = 127;
135  break;
136 
137  case 0:
138  map_mat_data_p[idx] = 255;
139  break;
140 
141  case 100:
142  map_mat_data_p[idx] = 0;
143  break;
144  }
145  }
146  }
147  image_transport_publisher_full_.publish(cv_img_full_.toImageMsg());
148  }
149 
150  // Only if someone is subscribed to it, do work and publish tile-based map image Also check if pose_ptr_ is valid
151  if ((image_transport_publisher_tile_.getNumSubscribers() > 0) && (pose_ptr_)){
152 
153  world_map_transformer_.setTransforms(*map);
154 
155  Eigen::Vector2f rob_position_world (pose_ptr_->pose.pose.position.x, pose_ptr_->pose.pose.position.y);
156  Eigen::Vector2f rob_position_map (world_map_transformer_.getC2Coords(rob_position_world));
157 
158  Eigen::Vector2i rob_position_mapi (rob_position_map.cast<int>());
159 
160  Eigen::Vector2i tile_size_lower_halfi (p_size_tiled_map_image_x_ / 2, p_size_tiled_map_image_y_ / 2);
161 
162  Eigen::Vector2i min_coords_map (rob_position_mapi - tile_size_lower_halfi);
163 
164  //Clamp to lower map coords
165  if (min_coords_map[0] < 0){
166  min_coords_map[0] = 0;
167  }
168 
169  if (min_coords_map[1] < 0){
170  min_coords_map[1] = 0;
171  }
172 
173  Eigen::Vector2i max_coords_map (min_coords_map + Eigen::Vector2i(p_size_tiled_map_image_x_,p_size_tiled_map_image_y_));
174 
175  //Clamp to upper map coords
176  if (max_coords_map[0] > size_x){
177 
178  int diff = max_coords_map[0] - size_x;
179  min_coords_map[0] -= diff;
180 
181  max_coords_map[0] = size_x;
182  }
183 
184  if (max_coords_map[1] > size_y){
185 
186  int diff = max_coords_map[1] - size_y;
187  min_coords_map[1] -= diff;
188 
189  max_coords_map[1] = size_y;
190  }
191 
192  //Clamp lower again (in case the map is smaller than the selected visualization window)
193  if (min_coords_map[0] < 0){
194  min_coords_map[0] = 0;
195  }
196 
197  if (min_coords_map[1] < 0){
198  min_coords_map[1] = 0;
199  }
200 
201  Eigen::Vector2i actual_map_dimensions(max_coords_map - min_coords_map);
202 
203  cv::Mat* map_mat = &cv_img_tile_.image;
204 
205  // resize cv image if it doesn't have the same dimensions as the selected visualization window
206  if ( (map_mat->rows != actual_map_dimensions[0]) || (map_mat->cols != actual_map_dimensions[1])){
207  *map_mat = cv::Mat(actual_map_dimensions[0], actual_map_dimensions[1], CV_8U);
208  }
209 
210  const std::vector<int8_t>& map_data (map->data);
211 
212  unsigned char *map_mat_data_p=(unsigned char*) map_mat->data;
213 
214  //We have to flip around the y axis, y for image starts at the top and y for map at the bottom
215  int y_img = max_coords_map[1]-1;
216 
217  for (int y = min_coords_map[1]; y < max_coords_map[1];++y){
218 
219  int idx_map_y = y_img-- * size_x;
220  int idx_img_y = (y-min_coords_map[1]) * actual_map_dimensions.x();
221 
222  for (int x = min_coords_map[0]; x < max_coords_map[0];++x){
223 
224  int img_index = idx_img_y + (x-min_coords_map[0]);
225 
226  switch (map_data[idx_map_y+x])
227  {
228  case 0:
229  map_mat_data_p[img_index] = 255;
230  break;
231 
232  case -1:
233  map_mat_data_p[img_index] = 127;
234  break;
235 
236  case 100:
237  map_mat_data_p[img_index] = 0;
238  break;
239  }
240  }
241  }
242  image_transport_publisher_tile_.publish(cv_img_tile_.toImageMsg());
243  }
244  }
245 
246  ros::Subscriber map_sub_;
247  ros::Subscriber pose_sub_;
248 
249  image_transport::Publisher image_transport_publisher_full_;
250  image_transport::Publisher image_transport_publisher_tile_;
251 
252  image_transport::ImageTransport* image_transport_;
253 
254  nav_msgs::OdometryConstPtr pose_ptr_;
255 
256  cv_bridge::CvImage cv_img_full_;
257  cv_bridge::CvImage cv_img_tile_;
258 
259  ros::NodeHandle n_;
260  ros::NodeHandle pn_;
261 
262  int p_size_tiled_map_image_x_;
263  int p_size_tiled_map_image_y_;
264 
265  HectorMapTools::CoordinateTransformer<float> world_map_transformer_;
266 
267 };
268 
269 int main(int argc, char** argv)
270 {
271  ros::init(argc, argv, "map_to_image_node");
272 
273  MapAsImageProvider map_image_provider;
274 
275  ros::spin();
276 
277  return 0;
278 }
